dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1876 IH: Stability to Ensure the American Dream for Youth Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Sinema introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend the reduced interest rate for Federal Direct Stafford Loans.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stability to Ensure the American Dream for Youth Act.
Subparagraph (D) of section 455(b)(7) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 1087e(b)(7)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking 2013 and inserting 2017; and
in clause (v), by striking 2013 and inserting 2017.
